level.heading: MODIFICATION OF A PREVIOUSLY APPROVED STREETSCAPE PLAN (ยง 24-1104)

level.text: The Director may approve a modification of a previously approved streetscape plan when the following conditions are fulfilled:
Repair of a streetscape element is necessary or when construction conditions alter the situation that produced the original streetscape plan;
Adhering to the approved streetscape plan will impose an undue hardship for the applicant; and
A viable alternative and modified streetscape plan is proposed.
Modifications to approved streetscape plans shall be submitted pursuant to sections 1102 and 1103.
